description: He pays every child on Tory Island, off the coast of County Donegal, a visit on Christmas Eve.
title: Tory: The tiny island where Santa's Christmas journey begins
title_page: Tory: The tiny island where Santa's Christmas journey begins - BBC News
maintext: "Everyone likes to come home for Christmas and we are all looking forward to it. It's been a difficult year for everyone and we hope 2021 will be a better year for us all," she said.
